messages.subject: Re: Portfolio Review
messages.msgSnippet: http://groups.yahoo.com/group/WV_Unschooling/ It doesn t look very active, but members may know an unschooling-friendly teacher. Caren

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/WV_Unschooling/


It doesn't look very active, but members may know an
unschooling-friendly teacher.

Caren

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Portfolio Review
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Barb, Yes, we need a certified teacher to fill out the form. We re in West Virginia. The form says that the teacher has reviewed a sample of the child s
messages.messageBody:
Hi Barb,
Yes, we need a certified teacher to fill out the form. We're in West
Virginia. The form says that the teacher has reviewed a sample of the child's work
and they are working to their ability. I would appreciate any help. Thank you.


In a message dated 6/20/2008 12:04:27 A.M. Eastern Daylight Time,
barbaraemrich@... writes:




Do you need a certified teacher to do it? Not sure where you're located or
what's involved, but my husband and I are both licensed teachers in
Oregon---and we're unschoolers of our own kids. The state doesn't require
portfolio reviews here, just tests, if you're registered. I'm very
curious---and we're willing to help if we can.

Barb

messages.messageBody:
How do you find someone to do a portfolio review that is ok with
unschooling? I haven't been able to find someone and I don't have much
time left. The few that I've found want a lot of paper work and we
don't have it. Thanks.
